channel.title: Ömer Faruk ER
channel.description: Recent content on Ömer Faruk ER

item.title: About
item.description: Hi there My name is Ömer and I’m a computer engineer. I’m passionate about creating mobile apps. I am working on Android software development. Also, I’m developing Web Service with ASP.NET Web API for Android apps. I am also interested in Arduino cards. I’m developing on VSCode with PlatformIO. Feel free to contact me for more..
